review: This was one of the best purchases I've made in a while.  I've only had it for a couple weeks but so far I'm enjoying some of the TV programs you can't get on regular TV, even with DISH's top viewing package (but without all the expensive add-on channels). It is clear, high quality picture and sound in a small unobtrusive gadget which takes very little room at your TV set.  Absolutely well worth the price from Amazon, with features that can't be found on other similar products.  I haven't tried the Voice Search yet because there is so much programming to choose from with my Amazon Prime that I haven't had to search for something else yet.  I highly recommend Amazon Fire TV for your TV entertainment.
